snippet: Boeing says the problem on a Dreamliner in Tokyo was contained by a new protective system designed to prevent smoke or fire from the volatile ion-lithium batteries from putting a plane at risk.
abstract: Japan Airlines says one of its 787s vented smoke when a battery failed; Boeing says the problem on a Dreamliner in Tokyo was contained by a new protective system designed to prevent smoke or fire from the volatile ion-lithium batteries from putting a plane at risk.

byline.original: By JAD MOUAWAD and CHRISTOPHER DREW

lead_paragraph: Boeing says the problem on a Dreamliner in Tokyo was contained by a new protective system designed to prevent smoke or fire from the volatile ion-lithium batteries from putting a plane at risk.

headline.main: 787’s Battery Emits Smoke a Year After Jets’ Grounding
headline.print_headline: 787’s Battery Emits Smoke a Year After Jets’ Grounding
